@@ -426,2 +426,3 @@ - * connect to the passed address and if that attempt completes exceptionally, - * then this socket will continue to be connected to the previously connected address. + * connect to the passed address and if the connect fails then the state of + * this socket is unknown - it may or may not be connected to the address + * that it was previously connected to. @@ -491,0 +492,5 @@ + *

If this socket is already connected, then this method will attempt to + * connect to the passed address and if the connect fails then the state of + * this socket is unknown - it may or may not be connected to the address + * that it was previously connected to. + *
